PVLib

Class PVGraphical

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • PVLib.PVGraphical
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, PVActive
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PVProjectile

    public abstract class PVGraphical
extends javax.swing.JComponent
implements PVActive
    This is that graphical class. It is any active that has an image associated with it. It uses the Active interface.
    Author:
    John
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
